3 reasons NOT to have a Samsung Galaxy note

by

Posted on January 1, 2019 at 12:00 PM

Yesterday I published a post to explain why you should have a Samsung Galaxy note.
In this post I'll give you the reasons not to have one (even if I think you should !)

  • **It's too expensive. ** The price of the device on amazon.com is $689.99. It's really crasy to buy a so expensive device !

  • **The pen provides no added value. ** There's a very good ad where you can see a guy doing creative things using the pen.
    I've the galaxy note since 3 weeks, I've still not use the pen...

  • **It's made of basic plastic. ** The back cover is really very poor. Samsung did it to make the device light, but it's really strange to buy a $700 device and to feel afraid to brake it when you need to open it !
